section.name: extend
section.p:
Making your own CaptchaEngine is very easy :
Create a class that extends one of the typed CaptchaEngine implementation (ListImageCaptchaEngine is a good candidate) in the test sub package (for exemple com.octo.captcha.engine.image.gimpy)
Implement the method that builds CaptchaFactories (for ListImageCaptchaEngine implements the protected abstract void buildInitialFactories();
method) corresponding to your choosen test (Exemple GimpyFactory).
You may take a look at the samples provided in this jar
